website_summaries.verdict: An exemplary paternity test that delivers results and confidential service to a high standard.
pros: Excellent customer service that allows you to speak to an actual person prior to submitting the test
cons: The test has 24 markers, which is complex and the instructions are difficult to understand

customer_reviews.title: Very fast results!
customer_reviews.text: Considering the importance of the matter, I felt it equally important not to skimp and pay a little extra for a quality test with accurate results. Having read the reviews, I felt This was the test for me. Am I glad I did! This test confirmed what I have thought all along - I am not the father, with the chance being 0.00% and performed the test twice for accuracy. They sent me an email confirming that they received the kit and then another email with the results only a few days later, even though it fell through the Thanksgiving holiday period! Their customer service was excellent. Megan was very courteous and friendly. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RAC

customer_reviews.title: Super fast results
customer_reviews.text: I read over the reviews of the other options available to use as Paternity tests and came to the conclusion it was worth the extra $29 to go with My Forever DNA. The extra cost was worth it. We mailed off our test the Friday before a long, holiday weekend and got the result the following Friday. This means the lab had to have turned around the results within 1-3 days. Be sure to tape the DNA sample envelope instead of licking. If you forget this and lick it to seal it, there's an extra envelope and swab so you can redo it. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the purchase of this service I found the instructions easy to follow and painless to apply
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write reviews but read others to gauge the value of the item or service but in regards to the purchase of this service I found the instructions easy to follow and painless to apply. The email notification from the company acknowledging the delivery was great and the prompt turnaround with the results was beyond what I expected from a laboratory. I would order another kit if the situation warranted or recommend it to someone who would like an affordable service for the peace of mind concerning definitive state of paternity.
customer_reviews.author: Exosus

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything went just as the listing said! The directions in the package were super easy to understand. It even mentioned the mailing type that would get the samples to the lab in a guaranteed time (Priority USPS Flat Rate). The only thing that stood out as odd was the sample packages. The thought of sending wet swaps in a paper in paper package seems like a sure way to contaminate. So I put my samples in a fresh snacksized ziploc before putting them into the envelope. I got my results in 2 business days! And for those of you who are sweating your email at 5p PST, I received all correspondence around 10p. (Except the results at 2p)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Pugh

customer_reviews.title: No one is more surprised than me
customer_reviews.text: Well this put that baby to bed. For years, I have had some doubt that my kid is my biological daughter. I mean sure she has my eyes and ears, but she’s a vegan. I don’t see how I could have a kid who’s a vegan. That’s some unnatural weirdness. But as it turns out, it’s more than 99% likely that she is. I’m still trying to accept it.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Livingstone

customer_reviews.title: Quick and professional results
customer_reviews.text: Forever DNA made a difficult situation a lot easier. I receive an email that the kit had been received by Forever DNA which was a relief. The results were received less than a week later even with a holiday weekend throw in the middle. The best part was the professional yet friendly email with the results. The results obviously come very medicals driven but the email broke the results down in terms that both I and the father could easily under.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Engelman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this and sent it in at the end of March 2020 (COVID-19). We messaged them after it was sent to see if the pandemic would cause any delays. Not two hours later we got a response from their team and they were extremely helpful. The test was received by their office at noon on Monday and at 9:00 AM on Tuesday we had the results. This was actually our second test so I can verify their results were accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Great testing kit
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have been better. We picked this kit because it uses more extensive matching than most of the competitors, so greater accuracy and confidence. The instructions were clear, the cheek swabs easy to administer, and we received the results less than a week after sending the samples off. We received the results by email, mail, and phone, and they were clearly explained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Service
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about My forever DNA. The customer service was amazing. The women who helped us through this difficult time were so understanding and so prompt getting back to me with my questions. I highly recommend that if you need to do a paternity test, you use this company. If I could have given them 10 stars I would have, but this only goes up to 5 stars! They are the best! Thank you for all your help!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita G.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Results, 24 Genetic Markers and Prompt Email Notification
customer_reviews.text: I was anxious to get my results, so I mailed the swabs to the lab overnight. I received an email they got the swabs and to expect the results in 1-3 business days. The very next day I received an email with the results. The results include the percentage probability of paternity (eg: 99.99%) and match ratio of the 24 genetic markers. In addition, it's signed by the chief scientific officer at the lab. Like others have mentioned in the reviews, be sure to use tape to seal the envelopes. Don't lick the envelopes to prevent cross contamination.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They’re legit-but pay for priority mail.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very scary situation but the company did respond to my questions almost immediately and were very helpful. We got results back sooner than the 3 days after they received the samples. We did opt for the $7.50 for the priority mail.
customer_reviews.author: ANONYMOUS

customer_reviews.title: Wow, that was fast..
customer_reviews.text: I'll start with the issues: Directions say not to lick the envelope, but provide a lick-able envelope. The user is asked to use tape. Solution: don't provide a lick-able envelope if that's not the desired outcome. Otherwise, this was an amazing experience. I received results in just two days (mailed on Friday, received results on Tuesday afternoon). I couldn't believe how quick it was. Would definitely recommend as one method for clarifying this kind of issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: I sent my DNA samples off on Monday. I got an email on Thursday the same week saying they received my DNA samples but with it being a holiday weekend the results may not come back till the following week on Tuesday. The day after this email I received another email saying my results were ready. I am so happy with the communication because it is a bit of a stressful time waiting for results. I’m also happy with how quickly the results came back within 5 days of sending off my samples in the mail I had the results! The people who emailed were very friendly as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Yow

customer_reviews.title: Fast accurate results.
customer_reviews.text: This paternity test was one of the more expensive but my opinion is you get what you pay for. It was completely worth the extra money. We received the package within a couple of days, did the mouth swab on myself and my daughter and sent it off with expedited shipping. They sent an email two days later that they had received our samples and within 24 hours I knew the results. Come to find out I had a daughter I didn't know about until now! Fast accurate detailed results! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A very Positive experience. 🤣🤣
customer_reviews.text: The Instructions were easy, I question the swabs not having some sort of storage tube or zip lock bag for after the sample is collected, I was a bit worried about cross contamination but decided to position both collection envelopes with the swabs oposite to each other. The service was great, Communication was great and any questions were answered promptly. Got the results 2 days after they received the samples. I recommend their services as their reputation is top notch and they live up to it.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Easy and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy and accurate! I searched for hours looking for a DNA test that was affordable, yet dependable. The cheaper DNA test had some horrible reviews, I decided that My Forever DNA was the most affordable DNA test with a reputable company. I was given the results when promised, and am 100% satisfied. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: busy7

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: The test came quick and was easy to understand how to do everything. Once sent back we received confirmation that they received it just days later. Just a couple of days after that we had the results. It feels so good having these results in hand, better than imagined. Just to so easily get that peace of mind for so cheaply is amazing. What an age we live in!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast and Confidential
customer_reviews.text: I researched many different products before deciding on My Forever DNA. The kit I received allowed me to check paternity for two children and a potential father. I received the package within a day. We did the test and mailed it back Thursday. I had the results back by Wednesday of the next week, even with a holiday on Monday. I didn't expect the results for another day or so. I was impressed not only with the speed but the level of detail for the results report. I recommend this product to anyone seeking a quick and confidential paternity test.
customer_reviews.author: Your Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Very quick results, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. In May (when many businesses were closed during the pandemic) I connected with customer service to confirm ongoing lab operations (given the pandemic), and they responded within 24 hours. Within a couple of days of mailing my samples, I got confirmation of receipt of my samples, and got results by the next day. Results were very easy to read and understand. Overall, I'm very happy with the service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery and fast results great experience
customer_reviews.text: This was a great experience. Received this dna kit within 2 days of ordering it. Comes with stamped envelope to send in sample. After sending sample, it was received by them in approx. 3 business days and was confirmed by them sending an email. Was told 2 to 3 days for results and received results in 24 hours. Highly recommend to anyone trying to get results fast and effectively.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin stinnett

customer_reviews.title: This company is sensitive to the nature of this test, and results came quick!
customer_reviews.text: So grateful for this test and how quick the results came back even during the Holiday. It was a very emotional and anxious experience, I was appreciative with the sensitivity and kindness I was treated with. I feel like they went out of their way to provide me the test results as quickly as possible before the holiday. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jakelebaron

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Accurate and GREAT Communication from Testing Facility
customer_reviews.text: While this product might be more expensive than others, the quality is impressive. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. Once the kit arrived at the testing facility I was alerted via email that it had arrived. Within 2 days, I had my results. The communication from the facility was really surprising and the best part of this kit, which is saying a lot since the quality is impressive. If you want the best in value for price, I wouldn't go with anything else. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: E. W.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and seems accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I used to the test to see if my dad was my biological father. Unfortunately as my mom had said, he is not. This test was easy to use, fast and reasonably priced. I feel that the results were accurate and now hope I can take them to ancestory.com and track down my blood father.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this product. All fees were included in the cost, including lab fees. There were no hidden fees. It also included all necessary materials. The directions were easy to follow and not complicated. I received an email as soon as they received the packet. They were very helpful. The results came back very quickly. And I was able to access the results easily through the email they sent, and print them out. The only thing we seemed to have a problem with was that the second email address we listed did not receive any emails. Other than that we were very pleased with the product and services.
customer_reviews.author: Forest corley

customer_reviews.title: Very professional
customer_reviews.text: I used this product and it was very very easy to use I forgot to fill out a portion of the paper work and emailed the company and they replied in a hour or less I recived a prepaid label to send it in to the company but I did pay the extra $6.00 to get it there faster I sent it on a Monday it was there Wednesday I recived an email that it was recived and I recived my results Friday night this is an awesome company and they reply to all emails quick I highly recommend this company
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: You Won’t Regret It!
customer_reviews.text: This company is amazing! The test is so simple and easy to use. I mailed it out priority on a Monday, I got confirmation via email that it was received on Wednesday, and the results on Thursday! I’m excited to know that my grand baby is in fact my grandson! After 1 year of investing, wondering, and stressing, I finally have a peace of mind. I researched many companies and read every single review. So grateful I picked this one. You seriously will NOT regret it! Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Reliable with Fast Results!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this service and was impressed with the prompt attention that they provide. The unit was simple to use and instructions clear. Once product arrived at their office, I got an email- the results were done and delivered in a timely manner with no hassle. I high recommend this- for such a sensitive matter!
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: This product literally changed my life.
customer_reviews.text: I found out “my daughter” wasn’t mine after 4 yrs. My ex lied about ever cheating until I should her the results of the DNA test that stated I was a 0% DNA match to her daughter...then she confessed everything. I highly recommend this product to anyone who has paternity questions. But fair warning the truth can be dangerous. Great company with great customer service. My life has completed changed in the best way. I’m happier now more than ever. I found love again and I’m looking to get married in the near future. Thank you, Forever DNA from the bottom of my heart. One DNA test and nothing was ever the same.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing company & staff!
customer_reviews.text: MyForeverDNA was amazing. My husband's family doubted my youngest kiddo- so we did the test on my husband & him and obviously, he is his father. 99.99% paternity but it solved the rift and the doubt that was drawing his family apart. I am thankful for the quick turn around time & the friendly staff who kept me updated. She told me to check my email after 3pm because thats when they usually got the results & I checked religiously. I got my results in 3 days. The staff was quick to always return my call as well. I now am ordering another to find out my own biological father. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fast Results
customer_reviews.text: Not only was this product affordable, easy to use, and has quick results. Their staff is very friendly and helpful. It gave my son the peace of mind he needed to fully love and enjoy his children to the fullest. A big thank you, to the staff. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Estes

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: My Domestic Partner and I had a situation going on where he came up in a paternity test so we decided to purchase this.. And low and behold we set it off this past Saturday and got the Results Yesterday and it confirmed everything we already knew he is the father.. Very Accurate and Very Fast Results we had just got the email yesterday saying it would be a day or so for results but before the day was over with they emailed us the results
customer_reviews.author: Aryeal Kegler

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product with awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: After looking around and reading reviews for several paternity kits I decided to get this based on the reviews. I’m glad I did. Very easy to use. Customer service is exceptional. They emailed me upon receipt of my sample and emailed me with the results in 3 days and also sent me a letter of results in the mail
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Fast Results and Easy Testing Kit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best and most positive experience I had. Although there was some reason to doubt my paternal DNA, My Forever DNA simple testing kit allowed me to have closure after 49 years. Thanks for such a pleasant experience, easy testing kit, fast results, and most of all for closure to a question I needed an answer to. You guys are amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jamie noon

customer_reviews.title: Fast Results
customer_reviews.text: Having to order a paternity test to validate who my father was has been one of the hardest things I've had to do, and not only that-- but the results were heartbreaking as well, BUT I am grateful for the truth that this test was able to provide me. The timeliness of the results was very much appreciated in a time of grief. I didn't have to wait long. I recommend using this test.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Fast results. Straight forward.
customer_reviews.text: Directions are straight forward and easy to use. My son is teething and had no problem with me rubbing his cheek an gums. Results came in 3 days as advertised and were easy enough to read using their directions printed on the results.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, easy to use at home test.
customer_reviews.text: Gave my husband peace of mind that he needed. Ordered the test on amazon received in the mail the next day, it took about 4 days in the mail to send it back to forever dna once they received the samples I was notified our samples had delivered. We got our results mid-afternoon the very next day. Great customer service and very friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Direct, responsive customer support
customer_reviews.text: This product delivered exactly as promised. There was a delay in getting results, but this was due to the COVID-19 global pandemic. When I contacted the company after waiting for the results for two weeks, I was able to speak to a person directly who responded to my concerns. I was encouraged to call back within a day or two. When I did call back the following day, they had located our package. Results were received the following day by email and within a week through the U.S. Mail. We were pleased with the company.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Envelopes not leak proof cross contamination
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed The envelopes you put the DNA Swabs in. wasn't leak proof So I feel like DNA was cross contamination
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Efficient, Discrete, Caring, Professionals...
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful ordering this type of test from Amazon, but reading reviews helped me decide on My Forever DNA. We needed someone to care, and that's just what we got. Communication was essential and we very much appreciated having someone available to answer questions.The test arrived in 1 day, simple flawless instructions. I googled how to take a DNA test and watched a few youtube video's just to make sure. This test was handled quickly, discretely, in a caring and professional manner by My Forever DNA. So Grateful for what you do, years of torment are finally put to rest. Thank You... and Yes I would highly recommend this product, and the staff behind this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this paternity test for my child's alleged father. It got delivered 2 days before it said it was going which made us getting our results back be faster as well. They emailed us our results in 3 business days after we put the samples in the mail, All I would have like the test more if they had a mouth swab to test the mothers DNA as well to get a more accurate reading or what markers came from the father and what markers came from the mother.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Lawson

customer_reviews.title: FAST, ACCURATE AND RELIABLE KIT!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this test kit because of all the positive reviews concerning the accuracy and ease of use and was not disappointed! My Forever DNA made a difficult situation a lot easier. We mailed the kit on a Friday and received the results on Wednesday. The email notification from the company acknowledging the delivery was great and the prompt turnaround with the results was beyond what I expected. Megan was absolutely amazing, your customer service is outstanding. Thank you for peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Extremely Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Turn around time is Quick
customer_reviews.text: To all who decide to use this product. You will get our monies worth, I had my doubts when I got this product but I took my time and read the instructions. I did the swabs and sent them out and figured I am in for a wait. In about 2-3 days I got an alert stating they received my samples and then 2 days later received an email with my results. I was pleased with the quickness and accuracy of the service and would recommend this product to anyone. Thank you My Forever DNA
customer_reviews.author: Robert & Imani M.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this test was amazing from the ease of ordering the kit. The easy to follow direction for use and mailing. Loved the fact that I got an email when it was received at the testing site with an estimated time fir the results. Would not recommend any other company. Simply awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Cates

customer_reviews.title: Great peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I got my test june 23 2020 and send it off the next day and received my test results june 30 2020 Very fast turn around probably would have been faster but they are closed sat-sun i am very happy with how easy and fast they great tool for a peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind and fast customer service
customer_reviews.text: This company was a breeze to deal with, even with the coronavirus having things shut down, they turned my results around in less than a week. Thank you so much for your service and the peace of mind that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Lee

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast results and excellent customer service. Plus the bonus is that the slight doubt in my head about my son being mine is gone. He would always be my son either way, but it’s good to know for sure that we are related by blood.
customer_reviews.author: Redleg27

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well for me
customer_reviews.text: The test was easy to read and everything was laid out perfectly. The result did take a little longer but with the Covid and the mail being held up I didn't blame them as much. Got the results I was looking for and I'd recommend it to my family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: Had a pleasant experience with this company and everything was done confidentially and in a timely matter. Everything was included in the kit for a little more than some other companies but to go with forever dna is the way to go. Partially because Jolene was very helpful and answered any questions that I had. Also shipping was paid both ways and instructions were thorough. Would recommend to anyone trying to clear up any confusion on paternity.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Accurate results
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Great directions. The Communication with the Representatives from the company keep you informed until you get your results. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: getgisela

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy that I bought this kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this test without knowing very much about the company, but I looked at several reviews and decided to pull the trigger. I'm so happy that I bought this kit. The results came back very quickly and I now have my full DNA breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: Aseaga

customer_reviews.title: Fast results great communication
customer_reviews.text: The whole process from the day we ordere until results took less than a week. Great for peace of mind just send it priority.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: JUST DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy, super fast and excellent customer service. Worth every penny to find out the 99.999% truth through science. Highly recommended for long term peace of mind. Please don’t hesitate the process is so simple and results are so fast.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN

customer_reviews.title: Quick
customer_reviews.text: Sent samples back snail mail and was expecting there to weeks of delays before I got my results back, but surprisingly I got the first result back within 4 days of returning them back to the lab and the next set of results back the following week. This was great compared to another service I used that took several weeks to get back with me. Speedy service.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: FAST RESULTS AND EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use. The product had good reviews so I decided on My forever DNA. I was surprised how fast I got my results. I cant think of any dislikes about the product. It was shipped discreet.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy to use product with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to use with very quick results. The company also had very courteous staff and provided great customer feedback
customer_reviews.author: LAMA

customer_reviews.title: Super quick service, and equally satisfying turn around
customer_reviews.text: Very quickly shipped to me, the recieved it really quickly, and the results were there just as quick. Overall satisfied with the service they provide. Definitely a recommendation for anyone questioning.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fast, accurate results!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously the need for a test like this can cause anxiety and concern. Getting results quickly was the reason for choosing this product. We put the sample in the mail 7pm Friday evening and had the results Tuesday afternoon by 4pm.
customer_reviews.author: Judith OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have no regrets with this test. We sent this test back and paid $7.75 for priority they received the test 4 days sooner. They emailed to let us know they received it (my husband lost the tracking, so I was relieved when I got the email) and We received the results 24 hrs later, 24hrs people! The swabs were painless and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Precious Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Fast service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit based on the reviews and I was not disappointed. Once the samples were received I was sent an email advising they were received and that results would be available in 2-3 days. That was on a Tuesday I received the results on Thursday morning. I would highly recommend this to anyone needing a paternity test it’s discrete and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: First product review I've ever written. Megan and Jolene made what could have been a stressful process much easier. I had questions before they received my samples and Jolene responded within the hour. Megan emailed me once they'd received my samples and she emailed my results the very next day. Highly recommend if in search of a peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clarity at its finest
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy and got results fast. Customer service emails were a plus to update every step. I got the results i needed. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mandii

customer_reviews.title: 99.999 percent accurate tested twice to eliminate all possabilitys
customer_reviews.text: works great fast and simple i am glad i went with my forever dna i recommend this test answers in 2-3 days after they receive your samples
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, easy instructions , and fast results. I took the sample, and mailed the samples via priority mail on June 17, 2019. They received my samples by June 19, 2019, and I had the results early afternoon, on June 20, 2019. I couldn't have been happier with the results, and the time. #MyFirstChild #NewDadOnDeck
customer_reviews.author: JJackson

customer_reviews.title: Simple test and fast results
customer_reviews.text: My Forever DNA paternity test was fast, simple to use, and provided peace of mind. I mailed our samples on Thursday and they arrived at the lab on Monday. I received an email from Anne on Monday afternoon confirming that the samples had arrived and were being processed. 24 hours later I received another email with the results! I would definitely recommend this product and would use again.
customer_reviews.author: spatterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This DNA test kit is very easy to use and has an extremely quick turnaround time. Megan from My forever DNA touched base with me at every aspect of the process. Would highly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Such a fast and easy process. I also appreciated the customer service experience. I was emailed when my sample arrived at the facility, which took away some stress, due to the current state of USPS.
customer_reviews.author: kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, fast and professional
customer_reviews.text: This DNA test is easy to use, accurate and the staff is professional and turn around time cannot be best! We sent ours in on a Thursday Priority Mail, and received an email Monday afternoon stating they had received the samples and had our results the very next day. Less then a week total for results. Would recommend to anyone looking for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Seth grinstead

customer_reviews.title: Look no further... This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Looked around, I read reviews on products that were just like this one, but half the price. I decided to buy this one after reading the reviews. It was shipped to me fast, super easy to use, I sent it back by mail. Got the results super fast! So many tests you can buy, just stop looking around and pay a lil bit extra. It will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry H.

customer_reviews.title: Very, very fast results, easy to use & accurate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and it was delivered in two days, super fast ! I put it in the mail and got an email two days later saying they received it an results the next day, didn’t pay any extra! Results were easy and sent right to my email and it says 99.99% you are the father or will say 100% not. Accurate and easy swabbing of the he mouth/cheek.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rentschler

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Easy
customer_reviews.text: I loved how quickly I got my results. I paid the extra fee at my post office to be able and track it. I mailed it Friday they got it Saturday and I got results by 5pm on Tuesday. I am 28 and it was great to finally have the results from my biological dad. Read the directions very carefully do not lick envelope tape it. Easy to read results.
customer_reviews.author: Christin punturi

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy and no hidden fees
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and fast! Very impressed with this service! Email results in less than a day (although they say it can take up to 3) and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Villines

customer_reviews.title: BEST DNA TEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received results just 2 weeks after mailing in. Easy to understand. 99.9%....
customer_reviews.author: J Notlimah

customer_reviews.title: Easy, responsive and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to do and to receive the information. They are confidential and responsive with any questions. I unfortunately had to use this during the holidays and wasn’t hopeful that I would get result to quickly
customer_reviews.author: Raz Torres

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy.!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and efficient. Great customer service. Called and emailed with concerns and both were answered very quickly. Got results after 8 days of the samples leaving my hands and there was even a holiday weekend. Super happy with them and will definitely buy again if I ever needed to. So easy to use too. Overall very satisfied and a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni bitters

customer_reviews.title: Great Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Great accurate results in a short time. I was slightly worried that the cotton swabs are directly put into return envelope without any plastic cover. But I Would still highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kas

customer_reviews.title: PROMPT, PROFESSIONAL, AND COURTEOUS
customer_reviews.text: Received the kit. Instructions were easy to follow and results were fast.
customer_reviews.author: MR. JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product actually arrived a day earlier via amazon. Next day, I took the swabs samples and dropped it in the mail. In 2 days I received an email stating receipt of dna samples. 1 day after that, I received results. Amazing. It is as convenient and as expeditious as advertised. Couldn’t be any simpler either. Good job “My Forever DNA”.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fast and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Clear instructions. Fast results. Price includes everything, even postage.
customer_reviews.author: pamedian

customer_reviews.title: Best Place To Go!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service. DO NOT USE DDC. THESE ARE REAL RESULTS. Coming from a FATHER, this company gave me the piece of mind I spent months trying to get. Now I can enjoy my beautiful little girls adventures stress free!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Jeanne Kirschnick

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and had everything I needed, had one issue but totally my fault and they were great in helping me resolve my own mistake, totally recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: Yadira

customer_reviews.title: What a great company!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the ability to reach someone on the telephone to get a couple questions answered. They also emailed you to let you know when they received the samples and that the testing was submitted to the lab. The lab results were received very quickly as well - highly recommend this company to anyone looking for a dna test.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Easy and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Came with clear, straightforward directions. Customer service was very good and the results were given in an easy to read format.
customer_reviews.author: A Gi

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Can never know if they're actually yours nowadays with the feminism and the whores luckily this kit made it easy!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: 20yr mystery
customer_reviews.text: for the amount of money paid I felt it was really outdated technique wise and confusing. The return packaging was soaked and the writing on the label was running.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best home DNA test, PERIOD!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this DNA test is and the fact that the results came back within a week from the day I put it in the mail, literally. The results were emailed to me (in PDF format) and were very easy to understand. You also have the ability to print/save the report. Definitely an A++++ rating!!
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you read the instructions very carfully.
customer_reviews.text: My forever DNA is nothing but a breeze. I was helped in many ways. Everything was as easy as one two three. We had a mishap on my part but my forever DNA took control and handled everything in an timeline fashion. I can't say anything negative. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fast
customer_reviews.text: I liked there were no additional charges for lab fees. The results were quick. The kit had several pieces to it but the process was explained and it was simple to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent experience. Would recommend this company to everyone who wants a dna service.
customer_reviews.author: stumble

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy how fast the results came in after they arrived. Results are very easy to understand. I mailed samples on 5/7/18 they received it on 5/10/18 results where ready by 5/11/18 .
customer_reviews.author: LEZZ1992

customer_reviews.title: Easy test with a accurate and fast result
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first time to write a review. I usually do not write reviews. It’s a Easy Test with a accurate and fast result! Most importantly, it has clear instructions, prepaid envelope & everything needed to complete the test. I can do it easily without any problem. I will order another kit for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Hao

customer_reviews.title: Fast results and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I was very impressed with the quality and quick results of this paternity test. The lab received his kit on Thursday morning and we were emailed the results on Friday evening. The results was not exactly what we were hoping for but we now know he has a 10 year old son for us to get to know and love.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding customer service. And super fast shipping and results as well. The only thing was the final results were a tad bit difficult to read, some areas were slightly hard to understand but still a great buy. If I ever have to use a dna test in the future I will be for sure be buying from here again.
customer_reviews.author: cody callendar

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: This test was very easy to take. Instructions are clear and simple. We sent it off on a Saturday, they received it Tuesday and we got the result on Wednesday which was faster than the 2-3 days they said it would take. We got the answers we were looking for and we can take comfort now that there is no more doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Klarissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast results
customer_reviews.text: My forever dna is a great , discreet , fast , accurate way of doing this . Came thru FedEx on time , sent it in, received confirmation. Two days later they had the results in an email. Very well worth the money, I know there are cheaper ones , but im glad I went with forever dna.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: The collection process was super easy. They let you know the status each step of the way via email and the results were completed within a day of them receiving the sample. The kit included everything needed and had clear instructions. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy! The test itself was super easy for the father and newborn. I received an email letting me know they had received my test and that I would have the results in 2-3 days. Super easy and convenient. I loved the fact they they communicated with me the whole time. I would definitely recommend this product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fast, accurate, easy - no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I liked the simplicity of the process, the speed of the response & the accuracy of service. The communication was phenomenal regarding receipt of the test kit, estimated results lead time, & the results themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Fast results!
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this was the fast turn around time. This helped a lot in my court case. It was fast reliable and very easy to follow instructions. Just swab, place in mail, and poof results come back within 2 days with priority mail. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sanft Family

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This was probably the best purchase I have ever made! I got my results less than 2 days after they received the DNA swabs! You get to select how you want to be contacted. I chose phone, so I got a call, plus they emailed the report! They also contact a second party if you wish. You receive a report showing all markers (which has more markers than all other tests I researched) I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit they are very good, quick and detail with the results
customer_reviews.author: Bobby P.

product_meta.title: My Forever DNA - Paternity DNA Test Kit ▪ Includes All Lab Fees & Shipping to Lab ▪ 24 DNA (Genetic) Marker Test ▪ ACCURATE & CONFIDENTIAL
product_meta.description:
▪ Our Mission: From our heart to yours we promise accurate and professional test results. Understanding that every customer is our highest priority.
▪ My Forever DNA offers an ACCURATE, FAST, ALL LAB FEES INCLUDED Paternity Test Kit. Includes 1 Alleged Father & 1 Child.
▪ Our contracted laboratory holds the Gold Standard in Accreditations: AABB Accredited and Annual Participants in the College of American Pathologists (CAP) Proficiency Testing.
▪ 24 DNA (Genetic) Marker Test + gender identification marker amelogenin. That’s 50% more DNA markers than industry standard. This provides the greatest accuracy and peace of mind to our valued customers.
▪ 99.99% Accurate: All exclusions are double tested to ensure accuracy. In the event that the first swab does not contain sufficient DNA, the second swab will be tested at no charge.
▪ All results are signed off on by our Chief Scientific Officer with 15+ year’s experience.
▪ FREE shipping included to return samples to our Lab.
▪ FAST & CONFIDENTIAL RESULTS: Results will be emailed within 1-3 business days after samples are received at Lab.
▪ EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE! Call or Email our friendly knowledgeable staff
feature_bullets: ALL LAB FEES & SHIPPING INCLUDED - 1 alleged father and 1 child
99.99% ACCURATE - 24 DNA (GENETIC) MARKER TEST + gender identification marker amelogenin. This provides the greatest accuracy and peace of mind to our valued customers.

ACCREDITATION - Our contracted Lab is located in the US, and hold the Gold Standard in Accreditations: AABB Accredited, Annual Participates in the College of American Pathologists (CAP) Proficiency Testing
FAST & CONFIDENTIAL RESULTS will be emailed within 1-3 business days after samples have been received by lab.
EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE! Call or Email our friendly knowledgeable staff.
